title: Post an Insurance Payment
description: A payment poster receives an Electronic Remittance Advice (ERA) from an insurance company and needs to post the payments and adjustments.

tasks.description: Import the ERA file into the billing system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system successfully parses the ERA file.

tasks.description: The system automatically matches payments to claims and posts the allowed amounts, contractual adjustments, and patient responsibility amounts.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system auto-posts the majority of the payments.

tasks.description: Manually review and resolve any exceptions where the system could not automatically post the payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Payment poster investigates and resolves the few payments that require manual intervention.
